## Study 2: Visual semantics in learning to read

* Longitudinal study with 15 children (5--9 years), 6 time points
* 18 month of reading instruction in Hindi/Devanagari
* Standardized reading tests + fMRI

```{r, out.width="93%"}
include_figure("slang_intro.png")
```

\smallskip

## Study 2: Visual semantics in learning to read

* Mini block design fMRI task
* Spoken + written non-words, pseudowords, real words
* Target detection task

\smallskip

```{r, out.width="93%"}
include_figure("slang_task.png")
```

\tiny See @dehaene-lambertz2018

## Study 2: Visual semantics in learning to read

* Longitudinal analysis using linear mixed models (LMMs)
* Whole-brain univariate change in activation strength
* Multivariate change in audio-visual pattern similarity
* Multivariate change in within-condition pattern stability
